main.name: Zafar Ali
main.title: Full Stack Web Developer
main.subtitle: Developing myself and my code!
main.description: who curiously strives to develop clean and readable code to solve problems
main.about: I'm a Toronto based Full Stack Developer who curiously strives to develop clean and readable code to solve problems. I love to turn ideas into reality through code. I have experience in Agile environments and a variety of languages and tools.
main.hobbies: My hobbies include going to the gym, coding, reading, and doing problem solving puzzles. My personality type is someone who is never satisfied and always feels a need to push myself!

contact.contactMessage: I would love to get in touch with you! Feel free to send me an email!

education.degree: Honours Bachelor's of Science in Computer Science
descriptions: During my time at Ryerson, I worked on many group projects utilizing the agile manifesto and GIT in order to meet deadlines accordingly without sacrificing application functionality.

work.title: Full Stack Developer
descriptions: Develop patient support program portals for pharmaceutical companies in Canada within the scopes of development and test environments using a C# backend and React front end.
Collaborate with Project Managers, Design, and QA teams to ensure software validation and verification, creating issues on GitHub if fixes are necessary.
Encapsulate all patient, clinic, and portal data within the circle of care in database and ensure authorized access.

work.title: Administrative Programming Coach
descriptions: Tutored students in JavaScript by developing projects, testing, and marking code.
Guided assistant coaches in the right direction when teaching students.

projects.caption: Developing Mindset Blog
projects.description: My personal blog created with Gatsby and Contentful.

projects.caption: React Shoes Shop
projects.description: An ecommerce shoe website with a functioning cart and signup/sigin.

projects.caption: React Palettes
projects.description: A React color selection app that allows the user to copy colors from various palettes.

projects.caption: React Evernote Clone
projects.description: A React Evernote clone that uses Firebase Authentication and Database.

projects.caption: Node Todo
projects.description: A NodeJS todo list that uses the express framework with a MongoDB database.

projects.caption: React Lyric Finder
projects.description: A React app that uses the MusixMatch API to find song lyrics.

projects.caption: React Youtube API Search
projects.description: A React app that allows users to search and play videos from the Youtube V3 API.
